column3: I'm in the middle of a story.
Well its not like it's a really funny story or anything.
Well so she mentioned that she had a son, and then for some reason, I launch into the story about the kid from Pennsylvania who was abducted.
Yes, it was.
I know it was stupid.
Hey, I just said it was stupid.
Take it.
Hey, would you stop it already?
I don't know, she actually seemed to get a little paranoid.

Nah, she's really good and she's not just a masseuse, she's a physical therapist. There's a big difference. She uses the ultrasound, it's a real medical procedure. In fact, if you get a doctor's note, it's covered by insurance.
I can't get a massage from a man.
What, are you crazy? I can't have a man touching me. Switch with me.
What's the difference, you're a woman. They're supposed to be touching you.
He'd just be touching your back too.
I know. That's the point. If it's gonna get sexual, it should get sexual with you.
I would? What if something happens?
What if it felt good?
I don't want it to feel good.
Exactly!
Yes?
I have a good masseuse you could go to.
So where do you get this note?
What's the name of this physical therapist?
Right.
Why not?
No, I don't want the man either.
He'd just be touching your back.
No, it could get sexual.
I wouldn't be comfortable.
What could happen?
How can you do that to your friend? He's got a wife, kids, and a lot of other stuff. Oh, yyyeeah.
Man, Ughhhh, wwwheh. I just came from Roy's. I threw up from the gas.
No no, he's fine.
Where?
Yeah -- yeah.
Wait, wait hold on now, wait, wait *bang* (he slams his hand down on the table, startling 1, 3 and 2) *bang* (again) *yip* (another high pitched yelping sound) *yip* *yip* See? I told you.
I'm sorry. I thought it was a legitimate charity. I didn't know you'd get audited
No, blame me.
Don't blame me.
It was supposed to erupt.
